text: The Albigensian Crusade or Cathar Crusade (1209â€“1229) was a 20-year military campaign. Pope Innocent III started it to eliminate the Cathar heresy in Languedoc and make the Roman Catholic Church supreme there again. The nobles of the Kingdom of France did most of the fighting, and it resulted in a reduction in the number of practicing Cathars. It also resulted in a realignment of Occitania, bringing it into the sphere of the French crown. ==Notes== ==References== * * * * Category:Crusades Category:1209 Category:1210s Category:1220s Category:13th century in France Category:13th- century conflicts
title: Albigensian Crusade
